content.rendered:
Directed by Gina Prince-Bythewood

Written by Dana Stevens. Maria Bello. Dana Stevens

Star Viola Davis(Nanisca). Thuso Mbedu(Nawi). Lashana Lynch(Izogie). Sheila Atim(Amenza). John Boyega(King Ghezo). Hero Fiennes Tiffin(Santo Ferreira). Jimmy Odukoya(Oba Ade). Masali Baduza(Fumbe). Jayme Lawson(Shante). Adrienne Warren(Ode). Chioma Antoinette Umeala(Tara (as Chioma Umeala)). Siyamthanda Makakane(Cindra). Shaina West(Esi). Sivuyile Ngesi(The Migan (as Siv Ngesi)). Riaan Visman(Tanonu). Seputla Sebogodi(The Meu). Angélique Kidjo(The Meunon (as Angelique Kidjo)). Wanda Banda(Young Nanisca). Lethabo(Young Amenza). Kekole Mathabathe(Ajahe). Daniel Hadebe(Oyo Secretary (as Dan Hadebe)). Kgomotso Moshia(Dayo). Zozibini Tunzi(Efe). Makgotso M(Iniya (as Magkotso M)). Thando Dlomo(Kelu). Zeaf Ejama(Fumbe’s Mother). Julius Tennon(Moru). Pumla Ndlazi(Ydande). Bonko Khoza(Boma). Sne Mbatha(Okankan (as Sne Mbata)). Boitumelo Makgalemele(Lida). Bongo Mbutuma(Oyo Soldier). Kwanda Tim Dlamini(Bothi). Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi(Master Abade). Didi Ledwaba(Teenage Girl). Chumani Pan(Abomey Father). Cebelihle Mbambo(Curious Abomey Child). Chris Ncekana(Dahomey Warrior). Tuks Tad Lungu(Village Leader). Yannick Brand(African Kruman). Nancy Sekhokoane(Shopkeeper). Joel Mukadi(Young Oba). Jordan Bolger(Malik). Princess Elmore(Villager (uncredited)). Maurice P. Kerry(Villager (uncredited))

Language English

Producers Maria Bello. Dale Butler. Viola Davis. Peter McAleese. Cathy Schulman. Julius Tennon

Production TriStar Pictures. JuVee Productions. Welle Entertainment
